::: callout-important
The PPLS Computer Lab will have all the necessary software, but if you wish to use your own laptop you can follow these instructions.
:::

## R and RStudio

You must install both R and RStudio (they are two separate pieces of software).

-   Make sure your **operating system is up-to-date**.

-   The **latest version of R** (<https://cloud.r-project.org>).

-   The **latest version of RStudio** (<https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download>).

## Quarto

Follow the installation instructions for Quarto on the [Get Started](https://quarto.org/docs/get-started/) page.
